issue.title: [JS] Implement JSON reader for integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1832](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1832). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implementing a JSON reader will allow us to write a "validate" script for the consumer half of the integration tests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1832?focusedCommentId=16296156) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
